mapper.select: select * from base_table_column where list_code=#{listCode} order by order1 asc
mapper.insert:
SELECT IFNULL(max(order1)+1,0) from base_table_column where list_code=#{listCode}
insert into base_table_column (list_code,column_code,column_name,order1,create_time,update_time,display) values(#{listCode},#{columnCode},#{columnName},${order1},now(),now(),${display})
mapper.delete: delete from base_table_column where list_code=#{listCode} and column_code=#{columnCode}
